docs.title: Item Tags
docs.text:
All clue tiers except beginner and master have unique item IDs for each clue step

This allows us to provide hints on the clue scroll item without requiring players to open the clue

docs.title: How To
docs.text:
Requires the Custom Item Tags RuneLite plugin

Paste the contents of the tag files into the Custom Tags section of of the plugin configuration

  • Multiple sets of tags can be used at once, simply paste the next set of tags on a new line

You should now see a tag on your current clue

docs.title: Gear Tags
docs.text: Provided below are recommended gear setups. This includes bank presets and screenshots of complete loadouts

docs.title: How To
docs.text:
Requires the Bank Tag Layouts RuneLite plugin

To import, right click the New tag tab button and select Import tag tab with layout

You should now see a new tag tab

docs.title: Gear Tag Links
docs.text: Beginner Easy Medium Hard Elite Master Mimic

docs.title: FAQ
docs.text:
1. What do some of these shorthand names mean?
Shorthand Explanation + Bank first - Degear for wildy GLIDE Seed pod→climb up to glider RESP Respawn: set to Edgeville FISH Max Cape→Fishing Teleports OTHER Max Cape→Other Teleports GVS Goblin village sphere BOX POH jewellery box
  1. Which teleports are for Ancient Magicks?
Shorthand Explanation PADD Paddewwa Teleport SENN Senntisten Teleport KHAR Kharyrll Teleport LASS Lassar Teleport CARR Carrallanger Teleport ANNA Annakarl Teleport GHOR Ghorrock Teleport
